overview: Vinh is born to a US serviceman and a Vietnamese mother. At the end of the Vietnam war, there were as many as 100,000 children like Vinh in Vietnam. Later, the US allowed a few to migrate to their father's country. "The Story of Vinh" begins his dazed arrival at JFK and follows his struggle with the foster care system and into adulthood.
title: The Story of Vinh
